events.text: *You add the tinder to the bed of embers below the cauldron.*

Thank you, assistant. While we wait, I need you to gather the final component for this ritual.
Any mundane object will do. The more unassuming the better, as it will serve as the eternal vessel to a small portion of my life essence, should any unfortunate events become my corporeal form.
Return to me when you have chosen the object and hopefully the brew will be of sufficient heat by then.
...
One last thing: this should go without saying, my dearest assistant, but please remember you are forbidden from entering my quarters.
These unusual circumstances do not permit the undermining of that crucial rule!
